message: I propose we split 60/40. I believe this fair and gives us both a good starting point for negotiation.
I think a 55/45 split is a more equitable starting point.  Let's see if we can reach a deal this round.
I understand your desire for a 55/45 split, but considering the inflation, I propose a 57/43 split. This ensures a fairer outcome for both of us in the long run.
